scripts.build-all: npm run build-control-detail && npm run build-questionnaire-create && npm run build-questionnaire-detail && npm run build-session-management && npm run build-sidebar
scripts.build-control-detail: parcel build static/src/control-detail.js  --no-source-maps --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/control-detail.js static/dist/control-detail-bundle.js && mv static/dist/control-detail.css static/dist/control-detail-bundle.css
scripts.build-questionnaire-create: parcel build static/src/questionnaire-create.js  --no-source-maps --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/questionnaire-create.js static/dist/questionnaire-create-bundle.js && mv static/dist/questionnaire-create.css static/dist/questionnaire-create-bundle.css
scripts.build-questionnaire-detail: parcel build static/src/questionnaire-detail.js  --no-source-maps --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/questionnaire-detail.js static/dist/questionnaire-detail-bundle.js && mv static/dist/questionnaire-detail.css static/dist/questionnaire-detail-bundle.css
scripts.build-session-management: parcel build static/src/session-management.js  --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/session-management.js static/dist/session-management-bundle.js
scripts.build-sidebar: parcel build static/src/sidebar.js   --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/sidebar.js static/dist/sidebar-bundle.js && mv static/dist/sidebar.css static/dist/sidebar-bundle.css
scripts.watch-control-detail: parcel watch static/src/control-detail.js --no-source-maps  --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/control-detail.js static/dist/control-detail-bundle.js && mv static/dist/control-detail.css static/dist/control-detail-bundle.css
scripts.watch-questionnaire-create: parcel watch static/src/questionnaire-create.js --no-source-maps --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/questionnaire-create.js static/dist/questionnaire-create-bundle.js && mv static/dist/questionnaire-create.css static/dist/questionnaire-create-bundle.css
scripts.watch-questionnaire-detail: parcel watch static/src/questionnaire-detail.js --no-source-maps --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/questionnaire-detail.js static/dist/questionnaire-detail-bundle.js && mv static/dist/questionnaire-detail.css static/dist/questionnaire-detail-bundle.css
scripts.watch-session-management: parcel watch static/src/session-management.js --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/session-management.js static/dist/session-management-bundle.js
scripts.watch-sidebar: parcel watch static/src/sidebar.js --dist-dir static/dist && mv static/dist/sidebar.js static/dist/sidebar-bundle.js && mv static/dist/sidebar.css static/dist/sidebar-bundle.css
